name: A Long Walk Home (Animateur Dungeon Crawler)
name_original: A Long Walk Home (Animateur Dungeon Crawler)
description:
It's late. Another long day of work has finally come to an end, and you're ready to go home and crawl into bed. 

It's time to start the long walk home.

The first attempt at building our very own piece of Interactive Fiction. Endings are still a work in progress, and artwork is currently in production. 

A HUGE shout-out to my friend Chantelle- I literally would not have been able to write this game without you 😘
